problem.markdown:
>>1. Hunter Gatherer is the term used by anthropologists to describe<< ( ) Group of people who hunt animal and gather food. (x) Specific kind of lifestyle of all human being until the invention of agriculture. ( ) Specific group of animals. ( ) All human beings after the invention of agriculture.
>>2. Dating of hunter-gatherers.....<< (x) 10,000 years ago. ( ) 8000 years ago ( ) 12,000 years ago ( ) 9000 years ago
>>3. Jakoi is a<< (x) Fishing implement. ( ) Fishing trap ( ) None of these ( ) Both of these
>>4. 'Jati' bamboo is spacially used for making the implement<< ( ) Chepa ( ) Khoka ( ) Polo (x) Jakoi
>>5. ..... is specially used for catching big fishes.<< ( ) Polo ( ) Chepa ( ) Jakoi (x) Khokafisa
>>6. Mbutis live in<< ( ) Sudan ( ) Ethiopia (x) Congo ( ) Malaysia
>>7. Eskimo language is called.<< ( ) Semang (x) Inuit ( ) Kokborok ( ) Siberian
>>8. Semangs use the ……………….. for hunting<< ( ) Javelin ( ) Spear (x) Blow gun ( ) Harpoon
>>9. Most hunter-gatherers share a particular characteristic called………..<< (x) Mobility ( ) Sterility ( ) Authenticity ( ) activity
problem.p: 1. Hunter Gatherer is the term used by anthropologists to describe
